title: Wear OS 3 could be coming to these Mobvoi TicWatches soon
description: The update is said to be only available for two of Mobvoi's products.

title: Samsung ends update support for the Galaxy S10 series and more
description: The Galaxy S10 5G and Galaxy S10 Lite, however, are still getting updates.

title: New Peloton app finally brings missing convenience features to the Galaxy Watch
description: The app can now show things like heart rate on the screen of your Peloton device.

title: Check out these shows like The Night Agent on Netflix
description: We round up eight more spy thrillers and where to stream them!

title: New OnePlus Nord brings 108MP camera and a juicy battery under $400
description: The most affordable OnePlus phone on the block.

title: Mighty Motorola Edge 40 Pro is here, and Motorola hints it might come to the US
description: For €899.99, you're getting quite the phone. Hopefully, US-based buyers will get it eventually.

title: Poll: Would you buy a phone without a high refresh rate screen?
description: Are phones without a high refresh rate automatically a no-go for you?

title: Your cheap Android phone might be better than the iPhone 16 in this area
description: Even older mid-rangers like the Redmi Note 10 Pro and Galaxy A53 support 120Hz screens. So what gives, Apple?

title: Google Drive rolls back new file limit that was locking some users out
description: Update: Google has set the limit to preserve stability and optimize performance.
